title: veTri mEl veTriyaDA
sahitya:
veTri mEl veTriyaDA kandavEl shakti vEl shakti vEl enradum


anupallavi

  shuTri varum arakkar kaDum sUrAvaLi munnE dUsiyaDA ini


caraNam    vErinrip-pUkkaLuNDO kanda vELinrit-tOLukku vIrap-pugazhuNDO
kOriyadai aDaivOm neDum kunraik-kumaitta guhanai ninaittadum
